title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should only result in redrawing the added lines, rather than the entire client area.
SR:
1. Set up a StyledText widget with word wrap mode enabled.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe the redraw behavior and note the number of times the entire client area is redrawn.
